content:
OmniScripts make remote calls using a new action framework built with JavaScript classes. The Action framework is available to all custom LWCs in your Salesforce org. Enable an LWC to make remote calls using specific functionalities by importing the Common Action Utility class into the LWC.

NOTE Custom LWCs extending the OmniScript Base Mixin must use the omniRemoteCall() function.

This generic framework flow diagram illustrates the order that the Common Action Utility methods execute:

To make the custom Lightning web component compatible with Vlocity Lightning web components, set two metadata tags in your XML configuration file.
Best Practice for Making Remote Calls
When making remote calls, start the flow with the executeAction method. Do not start the flow with the invokeAction method.

Make remote calls from any custom Lightning Web component using the Common Action Utility. The Common Action Utility relies on the Vlocity Action Framework to make remote calls without the dependency of a strict OmniScript data structure.
title: Make Remote Calls from Lightning Web Components using OmniScript
